import {OrbitControls, PerspectiveCamera} from '@react-three/droi'

const Maze = props => {
	let camera = {
		target : [0, .35, 0],
		angle: 1.45
	}

	let space = [1, 1, 1]
	return <>
			<OrbitControls target={camera.target} maxPolarAngle={camera.angle} />

			<mesh>
				<boxGeometry args={space} />
				<meshBasicMaterial color={'red'} />
			</mesh>
		</>
}

export default Maze
